verses.verse: <S%H4194>Dead<s%> <S%H2070>flies<s%> cause the <S%H8081>ointment<s%> of the <S%H7543>apothecary<s%> to <S%H5042>send<s%> forth a <S%H887>stinking<s%> <S%H7381>smell:<s%> so does a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H5531>folly<s%> him that is in <S%H3368>reputation<s%> for <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H3519>honor.<s%>
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> man's <S%H3820>heart<s%> is at his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand;<s%> but a <S%H3684>fool's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> at his <S%H8040>left.<s%>

<S%H1571>Yes<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> when he that is a <S%H5530>fool<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> his <S%H3820>wisdom<s%> <S%H2638>fails<s%> him, and he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> one that he is a <S%H5530>fool.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H4910>ruler<s%> <S%H5927>rise<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> you, <S%H5117>leave<s%> not your <S%H4725>place;<s%> for <S%H4832>yielding<s%> <S%H3240>pacifies<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2399>offenses.<s%>
There is an <S%H7451>evil<s%> which I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> as an <S%H7684>error<s%> which <S%H3318>proceeds<s%> from the <S%H7989>ruler:<s%>
<S%H5529>Folly<s%> is <S%H5414>set<s%> in <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4791>dignity,<s%> and the <S%H6223>rich<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> in <S%H8216>low<s%> place.
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> as <S%H5650>servants<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He that <S%H2658>digs<s%> a <S%H1475>pit<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> into it; and whoever <S%H6555>breaks<s%> an <S%H1447>hedge,<s%> a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> shall <S%H5391>bite<s%> him.
Whoever <S%H5265>removes<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> shall be <S%H6087>hurt<s%> therewith; and he that <S%H1234>splits<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> shall be <S%H5533>endangered<s%> thereby.

<S%H518>If<s%> the <S%H1270>iron<s%> be <S%H6949>blunt,<s%> and he do not <S%H7043>whet<s%> the <S%H6440>edge,<s%> then must he <S%H1396>put<s%> to more <S%H2428>strength:<s%> but <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H3504>profitable<s%> to <S%H3787>direct.<s%>
<S%H518>Surely<s%> the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> will <S%H5391>bite<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H3908>enchantment;<s%> and a <S%H1167>babbler<s%> <S%H3956><s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3504>better.<s%>
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H2450>wise<s%> man's <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are <S%H2580>gracious;<s%> but the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%> will <S%H1104>swallow<s%> up himself.

The <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H5531>foolishness:<s%> and the <S%H319>end<s%> of his <S%H6310>talk<s%> is <S%H7451>mischievous<s%> <S%H1948>madness.<s%>

A <S%H5530>fool<s%> also is <S%H7235>full<s%> of <S%H1697>words:<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3045>cannot<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall be; and <S%H4100>what<s%> shall be <S%H310>after<s%> him, <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H5046>tell<s%> him?
The <S%H5999>labor<s%> of the <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H3021>wearies<s%> every one of them, <S%H834>because<s%> he <S%H3045>knows<s%> not <S%H834>how<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
<S%H337>Woe<s%> to you, O <S%H776>land,<s%> when your <S%H4428>king<s%> is a <S%H5288>child,<s%> and your <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning!<s%>

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> are you, O <S%H776>land,<s%> when your <S%H4428>king<s%> is the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2715>nobles,<s%> and your <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> in due <S%H6256>season,<s%> for <S%H1369>strength,<s%> and not for <S%H8358>drunkenness!<s%>

By much <S%H6103>slothfulness<s%> the <S%H4746>building<s%> <S%H4355>decays;<s%> and through <S%H8220>idleness<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H1811>drops<s%> <S%H1811>through.<s%>
A <S%H3899>feast<s%> is <S%H6213>made<s%> for <S%H7814>laughter,<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%> makes <S%H8055>merry:<s%> but <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H6030>answers<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> things.

<S%H7043>Curse<s%> not the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> not in your <S%H4093>thought;<s%> and <S%H7043>curse<s%> not the <S%H6223>rich<s%> in your <S%H2315>bedchamber:<s%> <S%H4296><s%> for a <S%H5775>bird<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%> shall <S%H3212>carry<s%> the <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and that which <S%H1167>has<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> shall <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H1697>matter.<s%>
